snippet.title: Bō: Path of the Teal Lotus Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Bo is a hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania based in a colorful world of Japanese folklore. You play as a tiny fox spirit that grows from lotus blossom after being blessed by the moon god. It is an indie game being developed by Squid Shock Studios.

⚔Use your legendary bō staff to bounce and move fluidly through a delightfully-demonic East Asian fever dream. Use the tight movement and reset system to reach areas efficiently and gracefully or recover chaotically while floundering for footing.

😍Our links: https://linktr.ee/SquidShockStudios
💚KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/squidshockstudios/bo-a-hand-drawn-2d-adventure-based-on-japanese-folklore?ltclid=15456523-46ed-4f61-8b85-1fd5f8a9e75d
☕STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1614440/B/?beta=0
🐤TWITTER: https://twitter.com/SquidShock
🟪TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/squidshockstudios
▶YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRw75RcdThmGaTj3xsQg3WQ
🎧DISCORD: https://discord.gg/mvXDhcamxc
🔤FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/SquidShockStudios
📷INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/squidshockstudios
🔗WEBSITE: Squidshockstudios.com
📋PRESS KIT: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1IYZC_sVMakUpKP8NpcMe3CgcVryeAWyR?usp=sharing

🎌Our Kickstarter will go LIVE on February 1st 8AM EST! Please support if you believe in our project! The game can't be finished without your help! Follow the page here: 💚KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/squidshockstudios/bo-a-hand-drawn-2d-adventure-based-on-japanese-folklore?ltclid=15456523-46ed-4f61-8b85-1fd5f8a9e75d
